Effect: A Challenge for Heroes.name: Effect: A Challenge for Heroes
Effect: A Challenge for Heroes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c40APnn4a7bWhtcZ]{A Challenge for Heroes}

You deal an additional 10 spirit damage to the exemplar with each successful Strike.

Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic.name: Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic
Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.3qqvnC2U8W26yae7]{Bloodline: Aberrant}

Either one target takes a –1 status penalty to Will saving throws for 1 round or you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Accept Echo.name: Effect: Accept Echo
Effect: Accept Echo.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VAcxOCFQLb3Bap7K]{Accept Echo}

You gain a +4 status bonus to all saves against possession effects.

Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.name: Effect: Accursed Clay Fist
Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tMsAj0H0B9XZQjtH]{Accursed Clay Fist}

You take a -2 status penalty to saving throws against curse effects for 1 hour.

Effect: Acupuncturist.name: Effect: Acupuncturist
Effect: Acupuncturist.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SC95hfEEHQs7E9cG]{Acupuncturist}

You grant your ally the choice of a circumstance bonus to one downtime activity skill check. On a critical failure, your ally takes a –1 circumstance penalty to all downtime activity skill checks instead.

Effect: Adamantine Body.name: Effect: Adamantine Body
Effect: Adamantine Body.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GIr0i1ucWnMSLwJo]{Adamantine Body}

You gain resistance equal to 2 + half your level against all damage from the triggering attack or effect.

Effect: Aldori Parry.name: Effect: Aldori Parry
Effect: Aldori Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NZgjqVV2HYzLCvvA]{Aldori Parry}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Alloy Flesh and Steel.name: Effect: Alloy Flesh and Steel
Effect: Alloy Flesh and Steel.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkUvfczLFJcsv3Sp]{Alloy Flesh and Steel}

You gain resistance 10 to physical damage, except adamantine. You're immune to death effects, disease, drained, fatigued, healing, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, vitality, and void.

Your fist Strikes have a 1d10 damage die, and your metal spells deal one additional die of damage (of the same damage die and damage type the spell uses). Your metal Elemental Blasts deal an additional die of damage.

Effect: Anadi Venom.name: Effect: Anadi Venom
Effect: Anadi Venom.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.8aIe57gXJ94mPpW4]{Anadi Venom}

If the next fangs Strike you make before the end of your turn hits and deals damage, the Strike deals an additional 1d6 poison damage. On a critical failure, the poison is wasted as normal. At 12th level, this poison damage increases to 2d6.

Effect: Ancestral Influence.name: Effect: Ancestral Influence
Effect: Ancestral Influence.description:
One of your ancestors becomes predominant in their meddling. The first time you gain this effect each day, roll [[/r 1d4]] on the list below to determine which type of ancestor becomes predominant. During combat or another tense, round-by-round encounter, other ancestors wrestle for control of your actions. When you roll initiative, and then at the end of each of your turns during the encounter, roll [[/r 1d4]] and change your predominant ancestor appropriately. Once the encounter ends, you return to the influence of the ancestor you first rolled for the day.

Ancestral Influence

  1. Martial Ancestor
    • Preferred action Strikes
    • Moderate curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage.
    • Major curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +6 status bonus to damage
  2. Skillful Ancestor
    • Preferred action Perception and Skill actions
    • Moderate curse benefit You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
    • Major curse benefit You gain a +2 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
  3. Spellcasting Ancestor
    • Preferred action Cast a Spell
    • Moderate curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank.
    • Major curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank + 3.
  4. You choose which ancestor guides your actions

Effect: Anchored.name: Effect: Anchored
Effect: Anchored.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zxlbMEaXglMVsLpQ]{Tunnel Wall}

You become Anchored and gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} your space.

Effect: Angelic Blood Magic.name: Effect: Angelic Blood Magic
Effect: Angelic Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.vhW3glAaEfq2DKrw]{Bloodline: Angelic}

An angelic aura protects you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Animate Net.name: Effect: Animate Net
Effect: Animate Net.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bi9w4Z9MQY8VWLZF]{Animate Net}

On a success, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it Escapes; on a critical success, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes.

Effect: Apparition's Enhancement.name: Effect: Apparition's Enhancement
Effect: Apparition's Enhancement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yxqNBGvFkwi3pLVD]{Apparition's Enhancement}

One wielded weapon or unarmed attack you have deals an extra 1d6 spirit damage.

Effect: Arcane Propulsion.name: Effect: Arcane Propulsion
Effect: Arcane Propulsion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YgytD4HGjWNFwiev]{Arcane Propulsion}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.name: Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Success)
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and take a -10-foot penalty to your Speeds.

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).name: Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success)
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and take a -10-foot penalty to your Speeds.

Effect: Assisting Shot.name: Effect: Assisting Shot
Effect: Assisting Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot}

You gain a circumstance bonus to your attack roll.

Effect: Aura Junction (Air).name: Effect: Aura Junction (Air)
Effect: Aura Junction (Air).description: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to land and fly Speed.

Effect: Aura Junction (Fire).name: Effect: Aura Junction (Fire)
Effect: Aura Junction (Fire).description: Enemies in your kinetic aura gain weakness to fire from your fire impulses. The weakness is equal to half your level (minimum weakness 1).

Effect: Aura Junction (Metal).name: Effect: Aura Junction (Metal)
Effect: Aura Junction (Metal).description: Creatures with the metal trait take a -1 status penalty to AC.

Effect: Aura Junction (Water).name: Effect: Aura Junction (Water)
Effect: Aura Junction (Water).description: You gain fire resistance equal to half the kineticist's level.

Effect: Aura Junction (Wood).name: Effect: Aura Junction (Wood)
Effect: Aura Junction (Wood).description: Any ally that begins its turn in the aura gains 1 temporary Hit Point that lasts until the start of its next turn. This increases to 2 temporary Hit Points if you're 10th level or higher and to 3 temporary Hit Points if you're 15th level or higher.

Effect: Aura of Despair.name: Effect: Aura of Despair
Effect: Aura of Despair.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wjnfdh6WzN7HbmeE]{Aura of Despair}

Enemies within 15 of you take a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Aura of Determination.name: Effect: Aura of Determination
Effect: Aura of Determination.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.z7kwVNaCB4oJs3Fe]{Aura of Determination}

You and all allies in your champion's aura gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental, morph, and polymorph effects.

Effect: Aura of Faith.name: Effect: Aura of Faith
Effect: Aura of Faith.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7sFhBYoz5GSBFNbY]{Aura of Faith}

You add the holy trait to your Strikes.

Effect: Aura of Life.name: Effect: Aura of Life
Effect: Aura of Life.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YawVDUc9uzREIAnO]{Aura of Life}

You gain resistance 5 to void damage and a +1 status bonus to saves against void effects.

Effect: Aura of Preservation.name: Effect: Aura of Preservation
Effect: Aura of Preservation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.z7kwVNaCB4oJs3Fe]{Aura of Determination}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations.

Effect: Aura of Righteousness.name: Effect: Aura of Righteousness
Effect: Aura of Righteousness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.erCOcFZJPT2O3gwC]{Aura of Righteousness}

You gain resistance 5 to unholy effects.

Effect: Avenge in Glory.name: Effect: Avenge in Glory
Effect: Avenge in Glory.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.gKDRnsBPBdhJB0FI]{Avenge in Glory}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Avowed Insight.name: Effect: Avowed Insight
Effect: Avowed Insight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.G0Iw8ltK3Dfav8B8]{Avowed Insight}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against the marked creature's attacks and abilities.

Effect: Azarketi Purification.name: Effect: Azarketi Purification
Effect: Azarketi Purification.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.u94fcPT5Oukqzql5]{Azarketi Purification}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your ongoing saves against poisons already present in your body.

Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.name: Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity
Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine}

You are temporarily immune to Battle Medicine from that person.

Effect: Benefactor's Majesty.name: Effect: Benefactor's Majesty
Effect: Benefactor's Majesty.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.v0kwHxBXfTihnNSq]{Benefactor's Majesty}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Benevolent Spirit Deck.name: Effect: Benevolent Spirit Deck
Effect: Benevolent Spirit Deck.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JoZRbbexF3epeREe]{Benevolent Spirit Deck}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and resistance depending on your harrow omen.

Effect: Bespell Strikes.name: Effect: Bespell Strikes
Effect: Bespell Strikes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Strikes}

The weapon or unarmed attack deals an extra 1d6 force damage and gains the arcane trait if it didn't have it already. If the spell dealt a different type of damage, the Strike deals this type of damage instead.

Effect: Big Debut.name: Effect: Big Debut
Effect: Big Debut.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.PfnlKlLuqKOOhLyK]{Big Debut}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on Charisma-based skill checks until the end of your turn.

Effect: Blade of the Heart.name: Effect: Blade of the Heart
Effect: Blade of the Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GrKurXVdm5lJkE2q]{Blade of the Heart}

Your transformed weapon gains one of the following weapon property runes on your weapon: corrosive, flaming, frost, shock, thundering, or vitalizing.

At 16th level, you draw the greater version of the rune instead.

Effect: Blessed Armament.name: Effect: Blessed Armament
Effect: Blessed Armament.description:
The item gains the effect of a property rune.

From @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.EtltLdiy9kNfHU0c]{Blessed Armament}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LwQb7ryTC8FlOXgX]{Vitalizing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.P6v2AtJw7AUwaDzf]{Fearsome}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]{Returning}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.roeYtwlIe65BPMJ1]{Shifting}

From @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.h5ksUZlrVGBjq6p4]{Radiant Armament}:

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6llILJtsTPgtYXgx]{Astral}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LbdnZFlyLFdAE617]{Brilliant}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Holy}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gmMrJREf4JSHd2dZ]{Unholy}

From @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jYEMVfrXJLpXS6aC]{Armament Paragon}:

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.DCPsilr8wbPXxTUv]{Animated}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oVrVzML63VFvVfKk]{Vitalizing (Greater)}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hg3IogR8ue2IWwgS]{Keen}

Effect: Blessed Counterstrike.name: Effect: Blessed Counterstrike
Effect: Blessed Counterstrike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nSDXAFQKjMROlc2l]{Blessed Counterstrike}

The target gains weakness equal to half your level to all Strikes made by you and your allies.

Effect: Blessed Swiftness.name: Effect: Blessed Swiftness
Effect: Blessed Swiftness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Z6E1O8X7CFcyczB1]{Blessed Swiftness}

You gain a +2 status bonus to all defenses against reactions triggered by your movement.

Effect: Blizzard Evasion.name: Effect: Blizzard Evasion
Effect: Blizzard Evasion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.a47Npi5XHXo47y49]{Blizzard Evasion}

You gain resistance 10 to physical damage and weakness 10 to force damage. You gain a fly speed of 40 feet.

Effect: Blood Sovereignty.name: Effect: Blood Sovereignty
Effect: Blood Sovereignty.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WkHZbd79yfn15xod]{Blood Sovereignty}

You lose Hit Points equal to twice the spell's rank.

Effect: Boaster's Challenge.name: Effect: Boaster's Challenge
Effect: Boaster's Challenge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UtUT6JngJbQRHySX]{Boaster's Challenge}

You gain a status bonus to damage rolls with your weapon or unarmed Strikes against the challenged foe.

Effect: Boaster's Challenge (Critical Su.name: Effect: Boaster's Challenge (Critical Success)
Effect: Boaster's Challenge (Critical Su.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UtUT6JngJbQRHySX]{Boaster's Challenge}

You gain a status bonus to damage rolls with your weapon or unarmed Strikes against the challenged foe.

Effect: Bold Defiance.name: Effect: Bold Defiance
Effect: Bold Defiance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.oDFvdHVfrBzt16js]{Bold Defiance}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation.name: Effect: Bolera's Interrogation
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a failure, the creature takes a -2 penalty to Deception checks. On a critical failure, the penalty to Deception checks is -4. This effect lasts for 10 minutes.

Effect: Bon Mot.name: Effect: Bon Mot
Effect: Bon Mot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0GF2j54roPFIDmXf]{Bon Mot}

You take a status penalty to Perception and Will saves.

Effect: Bone Spikes.name: Effect: Bone Spikes
Effect: Bone Spikes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cy9jqlHz75GTjg7l]{Bone Spikes}

You can make bone spike unarmed Strikes, which deal 1d6 piercing damage and have the versatile S and sweep traits.

Effect: Bone Swarm.name: Effect: Bone Swarm
Effect: Bone Swarm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E4MS2wnRQJfyldrT]{Bone Swarm}

You become Huge, gain the swarm trait, and gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. You are immune to the grabbed, prone, and restrained conditions. You have weakness 5 to area and splash damage.

Effect: Born to the Trees.name: Effect: Born to the Trees
Effect: Born to the Trees.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6dpBiQ9lhgrAQzCd]{Born to the Trees}

You gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed and a +1 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to Balance and Athletics checks to Long Jump and High Jump.

Effect: Brightness Seeker.name: Effect: Brightness Seeker
Effect: Brightness Seeker.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.mk6rzaAzsBBRGJnh]{Call Upon the Brightness}

You gain a +1 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +2 status bonus if the result of the augury was woe and you proceeded anyway.

Effect: Bristle.name: Effect: Bristle
Effect: Bristle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1gAehVvstGY885kJ]{Bristle}

You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Calculate Threats.name: Effect: Calculate Threats
Effect: Calculate Threats.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Fha8jFmfkOPxAsrZ]{Calculate Threats}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and Reflex saves until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Can't Fall Here.name: Effect: Can't Fall Here
Effect: Can't Fall Here.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XJfUj2o4HdL5waZL]{Can't Fall Here}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the origin's level.

Effect: Cantorian Rejuvenation.name: Effect: Cantorian Rejuvenation
Effect: Cantorian Rejuvenation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.56HvICglqH7uR3AY]{Cantorian Rejuvenation}

You gain 10 temporary Hit Points. At 15th level, you instead gain 15 temporary HP.

Effect: Cast Down.name: Effect: Cast Down
Effect: Cast Down.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lGCFVYjL9Lp5m9Ex]{Cast Down}

You take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speed.

Effect: Castigating Weapon.name: Effect: Castigating Weapon
Effect: Castigating Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tSmd0cxq9wokSCh4]{Castigating Weapon}

Your weapon or unarmed Strikes gain your holy or unholy trait and deal additional spirit damage.

Effect: Cat Nap.name: Effect: Cat Nap
Effect: Cat Nap.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zvtYsz9jk8tPvlpS]{Cat Nap}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Catfolk Dance.name: Effect: Catfolk Dance
Effect: Catfolk Dance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Iqv8qj7ym63YjexN]{Catfolk Dance}

The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves

Effect: Cavalier's Banner.name: Effect: Cavalier's Banner
Effect: Cavalier's Banner.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CAaXGhHDMRM3Pt4J]{Cavalier's Banner}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Celestial Yaoguai Might.name: Effect: Celestial Yaoguai Might
Effect: Celestial Yaoguai Might.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fjB514XFJG4V3wMy]{Unleash Yaoguai Might}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

Effect: Ceremony of Protection.name: Effect: Ceremony of Protection
Effect: Ceremony of Protection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VSINzKESKAw2zA20]{Ceremony of Protection}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Champion's Extra Damage.name: Effect: Champion's Extra Damage
Effect: Champion's Extra Damage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.r5Uth6yvCoE4tr9z]{Destructive Vengeance}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M8RCbthRhB4bxO9t]{Iron Command}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{Selfish Shield}

Your strikes against the triggering creature deal extra spirit damage.

Effect: Champion's Resistance.name: Effect: Champion's Resistance
Effect: Champion's Resistance.description: The ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level.

Effect: Change Shape (Werecreature).name: Effect: Change Shape (Werecreature)
Effect: Change Shape (Werecreature).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.34E7k2YRcsOU5uyl]{Change Shape}

You transform into your hybrid or animal shape. Your equipment transforms with you and continues to provide bonuses, but your animal shape cannot use weapons, shields, or other held items and cannot use manipulate actions. You gain a movement speed, unarmed attacks, and potentially other abilities based on your werecreature type. These unarmed attacks are in the brawling group. You can Dismiss the effect to return to your humanoid shape, and you resume your humanoid shape automatically if you're reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Effect: Channel the Godmind.name: Effect: Channel the Godmind
Effect: Channel the Godmind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DYFOlJlMoDuHjrZx]{Channel the Godmind}

You gain precise motion sense out to 60 feet.

Effect: Channeled Protection.name: Effect: Channeled Protection
Effect: Channeled Protection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vgR68JyGFRCcTSew]{Channeled Protection}

You gain a status bonus to your AC and to your Reflex saving throws.

Effect: Channeler's Stance.name: Effect: Channeler's Stance
Effect: Channeler's Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.oLE64eHT9sB82lTP]{Channeler's Stance}

Whenever you cast or Sustain an apparition spell or vessel spell that deals energy damage, you gain a status bonus to the spell's damage equal to the spell's rank.

Each time you Cast a Spell that has the vitality or void traits and that restores Hit Points while in this stance, the spells' targets gain a status bonus to the initial amount of healing received equal to the spell's rank. This bonus healing does not apply to healing over time effects (such as fast healing or regeneration).

Effect: Channeling Block.name: Effect: Channeling Block
Effect: Channeling Block.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.75Y1Lk9JE3q1vDA2]{Channeling Block}

Roll 1d8 for each rank of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell, and increase the shield's Hardness by the total for this block.

Effect: Clue In.name: Effect: Clue In
Effect: Clue In.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In}

Whenever you attempt a Perception or skill check to investigate a designated subject, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide pointers and lead drills that ensure your newer colleagues' attacks strike true. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to attack rolls and spell attack rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's attack roll and spell attack roll modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Combat Premonition.name: Effect: Combat Premonition
Effect: Combat Premonition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JJPoMcxUf3QoKA6h]{Combat Premonition}

Choose two allies. Those allies roll their initiative roll twice and take the better result; You roll your initiative roll twice and take the worse result.

Effect: Come and Get Me.name: Effect: Come and Get Me
Effect: Come and Get Me.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Z9gzWFk3qom2z904]{Come and Get Me}

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}, and damage rolls against you gain a +2 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Come and Get Me (Circumstance Bo.name: Effect: Come and Get Me (Circumstance Bonus)
Effect: Come and Get Me (Circumstance Bo.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Z9gzWFk3qom2z904]{Come and Get Me}

Ephemeral effect. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Come and Get Me (Temporary Hit P.name: Effect: Come and Get Me (Temporary Hit Points)
Effect: Come and Get Me (Temporary Hit P.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Z9gzWFk3qom2z904]{Come and Get Me}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier, or double that on a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the end of your rage.

Effect: Command Attention.name: Effect: Command Attention
Effect: Command Attention.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.N0gJ4Q69nslbdXHg]{Command Attention}

When you attempt saving throws against visual effects, you use the outcome for one degree of success better than the result you rolled.

Effect: Connect the Dots.name: Effect: Connect the Dots
Effect: Connect the Dots.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.gwIgB6bMh0sruyX7]{Connect the Dots}

Your ally gains your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead} investigation bonus as a circumstance bonus to its Strikes or skill checks.

Effect: Consult the Spirits.name: Effect: Consult the Spirits
Effect: Consult the Spirits.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8cy4XIaSoL3UtpFq]{Consult the Spirits}

You gain a +1 status bonus with a chosen skill.

Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike).name: Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike)
Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Jbl71C5C6MnOqxV]{Consume Energy}

Strikes with the chosen weapon or unarmed attack deal an additional 1d6 damage of a type matching the energy you consumed.

Effect: Continuous Flair.name: Effect: Continuous Flair
Effect: Continuous Flair.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.13QpCrR8a8XULbJa]{Continuous Flair}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to further checks for actions that would grant you panache in combat.

Effect: Control Tower.name: Effect: Control Tower
Effect: Control Tower.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wBL5h0hTmVD4EJLw]{Control Tower}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within the overwatch field.

0.label: Seeking a Hidden or Undetected Target

Effect: Core Cannon.name: Effect: Core Cannon
Effect: Core Cannon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zeyrLJr6b7hPdx4w]{Core Cannon}

Your body transforms into a powerful magical cannon.

Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance.name: Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance
Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower.name: Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower Level)
Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

Effect: Crash Against Me.name: Effect: Crash Against Me
Effect: Crash Against Me.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cu7P7NB3XH67mi1N]{Crash Against Me}

You have resistance equal to your level to the chosen damage type.

Effect: Crash Against Me (Clang).name: Effect: Crash Against Me (Clang)
Effect: Crash Against Me (Clang).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cu7P7NB3XH67mi1N]{Crash Against Me}

You are off-guard and take a –2 circumstance penalty to attacks with the clanging weapon.

Effect: Crash Against Me (Note).name: Effect: Crash Against Me (Note)
Effect: Crash Against Me (Note).description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cu7P7NB3XH67mi1N]{Crash Against Me} via Ephemeral Effect

Effect: Creeping Ashes.name: Effect: Creeping Ashes
Effect: Creeping Ashes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.G4L49aMxHqO2yqxi]{Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes}

Moderate Curse

You and creatures in the aura are concealed.

Major Curse

You and all creatures gain weakness to fire equal to half your level.

Effect: Crimson Shroud.name: Effect: Crimson Shroud
Effect: Crimson Shroud.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.M2V1vqAziOkWV30B]{Crimson Shroud}

You gain fast healing equal to half your level. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Gu0QsFvWoR9EP5SE]{Swirl Crimson Shroud} action.

Effect: Crimson Shroud (AC).name: Effect: Crimson Shroud (AC)
Effect: Crimson Shroud (AC).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.M2V1vqAziOkWV30B]{Crimson Shroud}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your AC.

Effect: Cringe.name: Effect: Cringe
Effect: Cringe.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WoKiYMCXV27szBdy]{Cringe}

You take a penalty to the strike damage equal to 2 + the origin's level.

Effect: Crystal Luminescence.name: Effect: Crystal Luminescence
Effect: Crystal Luminescence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TLuFqQwvnlJNeEsv]{Crystal Luminescence}

The radius of the bright light and dim light of your crystal luminescence increase by 10 feet.

Effect: Current Spell.name: Effect: Current Spell
Effect: Current Spell.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the air trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the selected trait.

This effect has the selected trait.

Effect: Curse Maelstrom State.name: Effect: Curse Maelstrom State
Effect: Curse Maelstrom State.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.LJzk4Xxxs9IlbWz6]{Curse Maelstrom Dedication}

All creatures other than you within a 10-foot emanation take a -1 status penalty to all saving throws and skill checks. You gain the Expel Maelstrom action.

Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling.name: Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling
Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.qvRlih3u7vK3FYUR]{Ancestors}

Curse of Ancestral Meddling

The ancestral spirits you commune with haunt you and meddle with your belongings and actions, either out of a well-intentioned (but ultimately detrimental) attempt to assist you, as punishment for your audacity in circumventing the traditional means of achieving divine power, for their own amusement, or a mixture of the above. Your hair, clothing, and belongings constantly shift and stir, seemingly of their own volition.

Minor Curse

One of your ancestors becomes predominant in their meddling. The first time you gain this effect each day, roll [[/r 1d4]] on the list below to determine which type of ancestor becomes predominant. This predominant ancestor guides you to use their preferred type of action. When you try to use one of the types of actions listed for the other ancestors, you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:4]. On a failure, you spend the action but gain no effect (though you don't lose the spell if you were Casting a Spell). If your action would take 1 minute or longer, it's long enough that you can overcome the meddling, and you don't need to attempt a flat check.

During combat or another tense, round-by-round encounter, other ancestors wrestle for control of your actions. When you roll initiative, and then at the end of each of your turns during the encounter, roll [[/r 1d4]] and change your predominant ancestor appropriately. Once the encounter ends, you return to the influence of the ancestor you first rolled for the day.

Moderate Curse

The flat check DC to use other actions is 6, and you get the moderate curse benefit listed for your predominant ancestor in the list below.

Major Curse (11th)

The flat check DC is 8, and you get the major curse benefit listed for your predominant ancestor instead of the moderate curse benefit.

Ancestral Influence

  1. Martial Ancestor
    • Preferred action Strikes
    • Moderate curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage.
    • Major curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +6 status bonus to damage
  2. Skillful Ancestor
    • Preferred action Perception and Skill actions
    • Moderate curse benefit You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
    • Major curse benefit You gain a +2 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
  3. Spellcasting Ancestor
    • Preferred action Cast a Spell
    • Moderate curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank.
    • Major curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank + 3.
  4. You choose which ancestor guides your actions

Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes.name: Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes
Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tzDW9l4lBwXCVYtz]{Ash}

Curse of Creeping Ashes

Your body is slowly being consumed by the fires of your internal power, purifying you with each passing day. You are occasionally wracked with dry, wheezing coughs, and wherever you go you leave behind a fine trace of ash that falls from your body.

Minor Curse

The smoldering furnace of power within you begins to feed on your body and generate ash, which you inhale with every breath and leave behind with every step, impeding your footing. You take a –1 penalty on Constitution-based checks, such as Fortitude saves, and your Speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Moderate Curse

The ash you produce intensifies and fills the area around you, obscuring details and making the ground challenging to navigate. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}. An aura of ash surrounds you in a 10-foot emanation. You and creatures in the aura are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}. If you do not move for 1 round, heaps of ashes settle in the aura, creating difficult terrain that lasts until you move (when the ashes blow away).

Major Curse (11th)

You and nearby creatures collapse into ash with the slightest flame. Within your moderate curse's aura, you and all creatures gain weakness to fire equal to half your level. If a creature other than you in this aura is killed by fire damage, its body collapses into ash. Objects and structures in your aura halve their Hardness, and any parts of the object or structures in your aura that are reduced to 0 Hit Points collapse into ash.

Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames.name: Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames
Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.GTSvbFb36InvuH0w]{Flames}

Curse of Engulfing Flames

You see flames and smoke wherever you look. These flames might be imagined, or they might be a preternatural glimpse of the metaphorical fires that empower the entire multiverse-but you always see them. Fires flare noticeably (though not dangerously) in your presence, you occasionally smoke slightly, and your body is almost painfully hot to the touch.

Minor Curse

The smoke, heat, and crackling flames of your curse fill your vision and all your other senses.

Creatures further than 30 feet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you. You can't benefit from effects that would allow you to ignore or mitigate this concealment, as normal for effects of an oracular curse.

Moderate Curse

Smoke and flickering visions of flame fill your senses more completely, and harmless flickers of obscuring flames also fill your space.

You are concealed from other creatures, though as the other creatures aren't cursed themselves, they can benefit from effects that would allow them to ignore or mitigate the concealed condition, as normal. All other creatures and objects are concealed from you regardless of distance; however, when casting a fire spell, you automatically succeed at the flat check for this concealed condition for targets within 30 feet.

All your senses become imprecise beyond 30 feet, meaning everything past 30 feet that you'd normally be able to see is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you.

Major Curse (11th)

The flames surrounding you are no longer simply visions.

An aura of fire surrounds you in a 10-foot emanation, dealing @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage (basic Reflex save) to all other creatures in the aura at the end of each of your turns. You lose [[/r 1d6]] Hit Points at the end of your turn each round, with no save; if you have a weakness to fire, increase the number of HP you lose by that weakness.

You can suppress your aura until the start of your next turn by spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to diminish the flames, causing neither you nor anyone in the aura to take damage. While Refocusing to reduce your curse, you are continually diminishing the flames, so you don't lose HP. The flames subside if you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, but they resume when you wake up unless you rested for long enough to reset your curse. As usual for oracular curses, you can't mitigate or reduce the lost Hit Points in any way, though you can still heal the lost HP normally after the fact.

Effect: Curse of Inevitable Rot.name: Effect: Curse of Inevitable Rot
Effect: Curse of Inevitable Rot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.5QVUaQGT1FSkFOYP]{Curse of Inevitable Rot}

You take a status penalty when attempting to Treat Disease, Poison, or Wounds on the target.

Effect: Curse of Living Death.name: Effect: Curse of Living Death
Effect: Curse of Living Death.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.IaxmCkdsPlA52spu]{Bones}

Curse of Living Death

Your body is slowly decaying even though you are alive, and using your powers furthers this unnatural living death. You carry a touch of the grave about you, manifesting as bloodless pallor, a faint smell of earth, or deathly cold skin.

Minor Curse

Bones protrude through your skin and your flesh rots, combining with a stench of decay and an unearthly chill. Non-magical effects that would restore your Hit Points only grant you half as many HP as normal.

Moderate Curse

Your dead flesh continues to rot, affecting your health. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and this drained condition is cumulative with any other drained conditions you gain. This drained condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the drained condition reduce your drained condition to drained 1 instead.

In addition, you gain resistance to poison equal to half your level. You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against diseases, poisons, and death effects, and if you roll a success on such a save, you get a critical success instead.

Major Curse (11th)

You stand just steps from the grave. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1}. This wounded condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the wounded condition reduce your wounded condition to wounded 1 instead.

When you would attempt a recovery check, you can choose to get an automatic success instead of rolling, and if you roll a critical failure on a save against a disease, poison, or death effect, you get a failure instead.

Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life.name: Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life
Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.o1gGG36wpn9mxeop]{Life}

Curse of Outpouring Life

Life energy flows outward from you and connects you to all living things, but you expend your vital essence to do so. Your presence comforts the ill and injured, causes scars to fade slightly, spurs new growth in plants, and otherwise infuses your surroundings with vitality.

Minor Curse

As your life force seeps outward, it becomes more difficult to keep your body functioning. Effects that restore Hit Points to you take a status penalty equal to half your level (minimum 1) to the number of HP you recover.

Moderate Curse

The flow of life energy away from you can't be reversed.

In addition to the effects of your minor curse, you can't be healed by magical effects originating from other creatures. However, if you are unconscious, magical effects can restore you to 1 HP (but no higher). You are affected normally by healing elixirs, potions, and other items.

When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} and all your targets are living creatures, you roll d12s instead of d8s for the amount of healing.

Whenever you finish casting a non-cantrip spell, you restore Hit Points equal to the spell rank to your choice of either one target of the spell or the creature nearest to you. You can't heal yourself in this way. This healing has the healing, necromancy, and vitality traits, as well as the tradition trait of the spell.

Major Curse (11th)

Life energy tears through you to empower your magic. Some of your spells carry vitality energy with them.

Each time you use a spell slot to cast a 5th-rank or higher spell that takes 2 or more actions to cast, you disperse vitality energy in a @Template[burst|distance:30] with the effects of a 3-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell with a level 4 lower than that of the spell you cast. This healing occurs immediately after you finish Casting the Spell. You don't benefit from this healing. Instead, you lose double the number of Hit Points rolled for the heal spell.

Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge.name: Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge
Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tZBb3Kh4nJcNoUFI]{Lore}

Curse of Torrential Knowledge

You have a link to true divine knowledge, but your mortal mind struggles to process and act on what you know. Loose materials around you, such as dust, grains of rice, and droplets of water, slowly shift to form strange runes or faint indecipherable writing, and you sometimes speak unintelligible truths or statements in unknown languages without realizing it.

Minor Curse

You take a -4 penalty to initiative, as trying to process a surge of information about what's happening around you slows your ability to respond to it.

Moderate Curse

The flow of information through your mind grows. The attention you divert to process this huge influx of information means you are always @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}.

At the start of each of your turns, you automatically make one check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} as a free action. This uses a skill of your choice that has the Recall Knowledge action, using a result equal to 10 + your proficiency bonus in that skill (with no other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers).

Major Curse (11th)

The massive flow of information clouding your mind overwhelms your ability to communicate with others. You can understand all languages, but you can't speak, use linguistic effects, or otherwise communicate with your allies.

If you Cast a Spell with a verbal component, you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or the spell is lost.

You gain a +4 status bonus on saving throws against linguistic effects.

Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments.name: Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments
Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.EslxR2sbDK9XJaAl]{Time}

Curse of Turbulent Moments

Time passes differently for you than everyone else. You experience fluxes that might manifest as minor day-to-day changes in your apparent age, such as a gray lock of hair or a disappearing wrinkle, or as occasional ghostly temporal afterimages that slightly trail your movement.

Minor Curse

As you draw upon your mystery, time's passage becomes more disjointed, aging, regressing, or warping you out of sync. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}. In addition, you take a -2 penalty to saving throws against effects that would make you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}.

Moderate Curse

Time distorts further, increasing your muscular atrophy, age regression, or warping while making effects pass you by at an increased rate. The value of your enfeebled condition increases to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -3. Your status bonus to AC against attacks made against you from reactions or free actions while you're moving increases to +2. In addition, spells affecting you last less time; their duration is reduced by half, to a minimum of 1 round. This doesn't reduce the spell's duration for other targets affected by the same spell. Finally, all non-permanent conditions affecting you that have a duration measured in rounds, minutes, or hours have their duration reduced by half, to a minimum of 1 round. Any afflictions (such as poisons, diseases, and curses) affecting you have their maximum duration, onset time, and time for each stage reduced by half. Spells, conditions, and afflictions that last "until your next daily preparations" last for 12 hours or until your next daily preparations, whichever comes first. This doesn't change the duration you're temporarily immune, the rate at which you can use abilities that have a frequency, or any other features based on the passage of time.

Major Curse (11th)

You become so out of sync with time that it's hard for you to act, but when you do act, you do so with incredible speed. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}, the value of your enfeebled condition increases to 3, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -4. Time passes so much faster for you that your steps appear as a blur of motion to others. You gain a +4 status bonus to initiative rolls. Whenever you move, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while you're moving and until the start of your next turn. As normal for concealment where your location is still obvious, you can't use this concealment to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}. Your status bonus to AC against attacks made against you from reactions or free actions while you're moving increases to +4.

Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden.name: Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden
Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.gjOGOR30Czpnx3tM]{Battle}

Curse of the Hero's Burden

You thrive while adrenaline flows and your life depends on your might alone, but holding the collective battle prowess of the ages within you leaves your body weakened after a fight. You smell faintly of steel and blood no matter how you try to remove or mask the scent, you appear more muscular than you actually are, and you hear the faint clash and clamor of battle in the distance at all times.

Minor Curse

Your body languishes when you aren't bringing harm to your foes. You take a -2 status penalty to AC and saving throws, but each time you make a Strike, you can suspend these penalties until the start of your next turn.

Moderate Curse

The strain of conflict wears upon your body, even though you gain vitality from it. Making a Strike reduces the penalty from your minor curse to -1 rather than suspending it entirely. You gain a +2 status bonus to weapon and unarmed damage rolls. You also gain fast healing equal to half your level while in a non-trivial combat encounter.

Major Curse (11th)

Your body proves capable of truly heroic feats, but doing so interferes with your mental focus. Your moderate curse's fast healing is equal to your level, and its damage bonus is +6. You gain a +1 status bonus to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, but you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.

Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm.name: Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm
Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.W9cF7wZztLDb1WGY]{Tempest}

Curse of the Perpetual Storm

You are the center of your own tiny tempest, ever surrounded by wind and rain that worsens the more you tap into your elemental powers. Even when you are calm and at rest, your hair and clothing are blown about by gentle winds, you are slightly damp, and your touch often comes with a static shock.

Minor Curse

An aura of a whirling storm whips up in a @Template[emanation|distance:5] around you and in your space. The aura puts out small non-magical fires 1 round after they're lit or brought into your aura.

Electrical energy builds up within your storm, turning you into a lightning rod; you gain weakness 2 to electricity, and electricity spells or effects that have additional effects for a creature wearing or holding metal treat you as though you were wearing metal.

Moderate Curse

Your minor curse's aura expands to a @Template[emanation|distance:10] and carries rain on the winds. The whirling winds impose a -2 circumstance penalty on ranged attack rolls using physical ammunition that target you or originate from you.

Your weakness to electricity increases to 5 or half your level, whichever is greater, but torrential rain grants you an equal amount of fire resistance.

Major Curse (11th)

Your minor curse's aura expands to a @Template[emanation|distance:15] and grows stronger. High winds blowing outward in the aura impede creatures' progress. The aura is difficult terrain for Large and smaller creatures on the ground, and for Huge or smaller flying creatures. You aren't affected by this difficult terrain.

The electricity arcing through you becomes dangerous. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[1d6[electricity]] damage. As normal, this doesn't affect creatures you touch.

Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call.name: Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call
Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RI2EMRBBPNSoTJXu]{Cosmos}

Curse of the Sky's Call

You have your head in the clouds-and not just figuratively. Your body is drawn toward the heavens, making you lighter and less substantial than you should be. Your eyes glow with starry light, and your hair and clothing float and drift around you.

Minor Curse

Your unnatural lightness makes it hard to keep your footing and interact with other physical objects. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and take a -2 penalty to saves and DCs against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, and other forms of forced movement.

Moderate Curse

Your body is drawn further skyward. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -3.

You are treated as one size smaller for wind effects. You gain a +2 status bonus against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} attempts, you only take half as much damage from falls, and you gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.HJYQlmGTdtyGWr6a]{Powerful Leap} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZBhvJ9O8MvBFAlhq]{Quick Jump} skill feats. You weigh only half as much, and your Bulk, should someone need to carry you, is also half as much.

Major Curse (11th)

As your body rises, you float just above the ground beneath you. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4}, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -4.

You can walk on liquids as if they were solid; you gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TVFfTP9fHRidwBlW]{Cloud Jump} skill feat; and you don't leave tracks, trigger weight-sensitive pressure plates, or otherwise connect with the ground below you.

Effect: Cut from the Air.name: Effect: Cut from the Air
Effect: Cut from the Air.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6xBu4BewIkOIt9M0]{Cut From the Air}.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Cyclonic Ascent.name: Effect: Cyclonic Ascent
Effect: Cyclonic Ascent.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.u9ZuPuXj0xA4dHxr]{Cyclonic Ascent}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed or 30 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Dancer in the Seasons.name: Effect: Dancer in the Seasons
Effect: Dancer in the Seasons.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.vrKfwncFKxapUYRp]{Dancer in the Seasons}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Daydream Trance.name: Effect: Daydream Trance
Effect: Daydream Trance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5LW1k5DUkzbbYuYL]{Daydream Trance}

You take a -1 penalty to Perception checks and initiative rolls and gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. This bonus increases to +2 against mental effects. If you're legendary in Occultism, the bonus against mental effects increases to +3.

Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon
Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AYXherMu9gFTyXjp]{Deadly Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Debilitating Strike.name: Effect: Debilitating Strike
Effect: Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

Effect: Declare Anathema.name: Effect: Declare Anathema
Effect: Declare Anathema.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7P5aKtFoPVJJPPEV]{Declare Anathema}

You gain weakness 10 to spirit damage.

Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).name: Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -10 foot status penalty to Speed and a -4 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Decry Thief (Success).name: Effect: Decry Thief (Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -5 foot status penalty to Speed and a -2 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Deep Freeze.name: Effect: Deep Freeze
Effect: Deep Freeze.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jNzjecRGyyAqkkrm]{Deep Freeze}

On a Success, you take a -5-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

On a Failure, you take a -10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

On a Critical Failure, you are slowed 1 and take a -15-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

Effect: Defensive Instincts.name: Effect: Defensive Instincts
Effect: Defensive Instincts.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RxA1PdgGbijkieJD]{Defensive Instincts}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Defensive Recovery.name: Effect: Defensive Recovery
Effect: Defensive Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d1ktdX1Fk37dG5ms]{Defensive Recovery}

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

Effect: Dehydrated.name: Effect: Dehydrated
Effect: Dehydrated.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.vt67b8uoNEbskcBv]{Hydration}

You take a -1 status penalty to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Deity's Protection.name: Effect: Deity's Protection
Effect: Deity's Protection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DUb1VWSbTjdsbAkQ]{Deity's Protection}

You gain resistance to all damage.

Effect: Demonic Blood Magic.name: Effect: Demonic Blood Magic
Effect: Demonic Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.w5koctOVrEcpxTIq]{Bloodline: Demonic}

Either a target takes a -1 status penalty to AC for 1 round, or you gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks.

Effect: Desperate Wrath.name: Effect: Desperate Wrath
Effect: Desperate Wrath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EWeso1zDkCLGlnsW]{Desperate Wrath}

You get a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, a –1 penalty to AC, and a –1 penalty to saves. These bonuses and penalties last until your Rage ends or until you are above half Hit Points, whichever comes first.

Effect: Devise a Stratagem.name: Effect: Devise a Stratagem
Effect: Devise a Stratagem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devise a Stratagem}

You assess a foe's weaknesses in combat and use them to formulate a plan of attack against your enemy. Choose a creature you can see, and roll a d20. If you Strike the chosen creature later this round, you must use the result of the roll you made to Devise a Stratagem for your Strike's attack roll instead of rolling. You make this substitution only for the first Strike you make against the creature this round, not any subsequent attacks.

When you make this substitution, you can also add your Intelligence modifier to your attack roll instead of your Strength or Dexterity modifier, provided your Strike uses an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, a ranged weapon (which must be agile or finesse if it's a melee weapon with the thrown trait) or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TLQErnOpM9Luy7rL]{Sap}.

Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance.name: Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance
Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OqqytsF2RIjB0EPR]{Devrin's Cunning Stance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks. When you Strike an off-guard enemy, that enemy can't use reactions until the beginning of its next turn.

Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.o39zQMIdERWtmBSB]{Bloodline: Diabolic}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.

Effect: Didactic Strike.name: Effect: Didactic Strike
Effect: Didactic Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6fojN9yBJByTZ1Q9]{Didactic Strike}.

Your first attack against the designated target before the investigator's next turn deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to the target if it hits.

Effect: Discordant Voice.name: Effect: Discordant Voice
Effect: Discordant Voice.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8JMOgtB3XG7o6ffW]{Discordant Voice}, while you are affected by Inspire Courage.

Effect: Disrupting Strikes.name: Effect: Disrupting Strikes
Effect: Disrupting Strikes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Nm8n3urzpDqXni1i]{Disrupting Strikes}

Your weapon and unarmed Strikes gain the effects of a disrupting property rune until the start of your next turn.

If you're 14th level or higher, your Strikes instead gain the effects of a greater disrupting property rune.

Effect: Disruptive Stare.name: Effect: Disruptive Stare
Effect: Disruptive Stare.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d3J74jmGOrPBWUm9]{Disruptive Stare}

You take a –2 status penalty to your spell attack rolls and DCs.

Effect: Distant Wandering.name: Effect: Distant Wandering
Effect: Distant Wandering.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YFPmD8BHv0XaF55G]{Distant Wandering}

You are invisible and inaudible.

Awakening You gain a fly Speed and a +20-foot status bonus to your Speed

Awakening You are Quickened while in spirit form and can use the extra action only to Recall Knowledge or Seek.

Effect: Distracting Feint.name: Effect: Distracting Feint
Effect: Distracting Feint.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hLYoIjH8gPEVXyWG]{Distracting Feint}

While you are off-guard by the origin's Feint, you also takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.

Effect: Diverting Vortex.name: Effect: Diverting Vortex
Effect: Diverting Vortex.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.PqZZSo06BH5N7x7C]{Diverting Vortex}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC against ranged weapon attacks and physical ranged unarmed attacks.

Effect: Divine Aegis.name: Effect: Divine Aegis
Effect: Divine Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xoIxiRtBVHV27Rvd]{Divine Aegis}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects, but you also take a -1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.

Effect: Divine Castigation.name: Effect: Divine Castigation
Effect: Divine Castigation.description:
Imposed by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.142QRyK2aPIrJu48]{Divine Castigation}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spells you cast damage fiends as though they were undead.

Effect: Divine Health.name: Effect: Divine Health
Effect: Divine Health.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GNMy7NYfF3AQwHpN]{Divine Health}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against diseases and poisons.

Effect: Divine Infusion.name: Effect: Divine Infusion
Effect: Divine Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Divine Infusion}

You deal additional damage with your melee weapons and unarmed attacks. The damage type is void if you cast harm and vitality if you cast heal.

Effect: Divine Rebuttal.name: Effect: Divine Rebuttal
Effect: Divine Rebuttal.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iLFK11lcw5hViTBS]{Divine Rebuttal}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw (or a +3 circumstance bonus on a critical hit).

Effect: Divine Weapon.name: Effect: Divine Weapon
Effect: Divine Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}

The weapon deals an additional 1d4 spirit damage. If you are holy or unholy, Strikes with the weapon also gain that trait, and the additional damage increases to 2d4 against creatures of the opposing trait.

Effect: Divine Wings.name: Effect: Divine Wings
Effect: Divine Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vtCrMziYxNyj8kP7]{Divine Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.name: Effect: Draconic Blood Magic
Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ZHabYxSgYK0XbjhM]{Bloodline: Draconic}

Draconic scales grow briefly on you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings.name: Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings
Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bqZkAFS6eq9TKXMO]{Dragon's Rage Wings}

While you are raging, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Effect: Draw From the Land.name: Effect: Draw From the Land
Effect: Draw From the Land.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.HlqAdfxmcd9gdgHa]{Draw From the Land}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Dread Marshal Stance
Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls. When the marshal or an ally in the aura critically hit an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}. If the marshal is wielding a weapon that has more than one damage die (typically due to a striking rune), you can have the status bonus equal the weapon's number of damage dice instead of +1.

Effect: Dueling Parry.name: Effect: Dueling Parry
Effect: Dueling Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WcY7H7mRiK2VDquV]{Extravagant Parry} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.n7nQQR940OvFbw7T]{Dueling Parry}

You gain a circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Duelist's Challenge.name: Effect: Duelist's Challenge
Effect: Duelist's Challenge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5op3m0gwZjL4udit]{Duelist's Challenge}

Any time you hit your dueling opponent using a single one-handed melee weapon while your other hand or hands are free, you gain a circumstance bonus to the Strike's damage equal to the number of damage dice your weapon deals.

If you attack a creature other than your dueling opponent, you take a circumstance penalty to damage equal to the number of damage dice your weapon deals.

Effect: Earth Impulse Junction.name: Effect: Earth Impulse Junction
Effect: Earth Impulse Junction.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Echoes in Stone.name: Effect: Echoes in Stone
Effect: Echoes in Stone.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nKkbEKbE9vfKWKdd]{Echoes in Stone}

You gain imprecise tremorsense with a range of 20 feet.

Effect: Educate Allies.name: Effect: Educate Allies
Effect: Educate Allies.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies}.

All allies affected by your composition spell gain your +1 circumstance bonus from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iX5HEqRImhKzfPR2]{Well-Versed} until the start of your next turn. Your personal circumstance bonus from Well-Versed also increases to +2 until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Elemental Assault.name: Effect: Elemental Assault
Effect: Elemental Assault.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OKSsFlHY5UKc4dKu]{Elemental Assault}

Your Strikes deal an additional 1d6 damage of the indicated type and have the trait corresponding to the element: electricity for air, bludgeoning for earth, fire for fire, or cold for water.

Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RXRnJcG4XSabZ35a]{Bloodline: Elemental}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks.

Effect: Elemental Bulwark.name: Effect: Elemental Bulwark
Effect: Elemental Bulwark.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IUVzB39pRVyBFOEx]{Elemental Bulwark}

You gain resistance against the triggering damage.

Effect: Elementalist Dedication.name: Effect: Elementalist Dedication
Effect: Elementalist Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{Elementalist Dedication}

Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice from your elemental philosophy. You gain resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1 resistance) against damage dealt by effects with your attuned elemental trait. This attunement lasts until you next make your daily preparations.

Effect: Emblazon Antimagic.name: Effect: Emblazon Antimagic
Effect: Emblazon Antimagic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xAFdoKl7aOP9rVkl]{Emblazon Antimagic}

  • Shield You gain the shield's circumstance bonus to saving throws against magic.
  • Weapon When you critically hit with the weapon, you can attempt to counteract a spell on the target, using half your level, rounded up, as the counteract rank.

Effect: Emblazon Armament.name: Effect: Emblazon Armament
Effect: Emblazon Armament.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament}

  • Shield The shield gains a +1 status bonus to its Hardness.
  • Weapon The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls with the weapon.

Effect: Emblazon Energy.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy
Effect: Emblazon Energy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy}

  • Shield Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. You gain the shield's circumstance bonus to saving throws against that damage type.
  • Weapon Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The weapon deals an extra 1d4 damage of that type. Increase this extra damage to 1d6 if you have a domain spell with a trait matching that type.

Effect: Emboldened with Glorious Purpose.name: Effect: Emboldened with Glorious Purpose
Effect: Emboldened with Glorious Purpose.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uYhaIKxlvGj4YNCc]{Emboldened with Glorious Purpose}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 against emotion and fear effects.

Effect: Emotional Surge.name: Effect: Emotional Surge
Effect: Emotional Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8DI7wLxtUy99g9K]{Emotional Surge}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.

Effect: Empathetic Plea.name: Effect: Empathetic Plea
Effect: Empathetic Plea.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MS53Ds75BT379ZFm]{Empathetic Plea}

You take a -2 circumstance penalty to damage on the triggering Strike and all its Strikes against the target. The penalty is -4 if an expert in Diplomacy, -6 if master, and -8 if legendary.

Effect: Empowered Onslaught.name: Effect: Empowered Onslaught
Effect: Empowered Onslaught.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4evo0jTAKBhowyDG]{Empowered Onslaught}

The chosen battle aura's status bonus or penalty increases by 1, to a maximum of 4.

Effect: Encroaching Presence.name: Effect: Encroaching Presence
Effect: Encroaching Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.6RAHnACKReBW68Sa]{Encroaching Presence}

Mild Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Moderate Backlash All creatures become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you as they are covered in visual distortions only you can see.

Severe Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} until your next daily preparations.

Effect: Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Endemic Herbs
Effect: Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

You gain a benefit matching the location where the item was created.

  • Aquatic You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.
  • Forest You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.
  • Mountain You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.
  • Plains You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.
  • Underground You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.name: Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike
Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike} if the rogue also has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RzfWrOqHL2GcK0rr]{Enduring Debilitation}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

Effect: Energetic Meltdown.name: Effect: Energetic Meltdown
Effect: Energetic Meltdown.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.8PjTI21Mif26XWY7]{Energetic Meltdown}

Mild Backlash You take @Damage[(@actor.level)[untyped]]{damage equal to your level} as energy scours your body.

Moderate Backlash After taking the damage, you gain weakness to the energy type of your backlash until your next daily preparations. The weakness is equal to one-third of your level. You also lose immunity to the energy type if you had it, until your next daily preparations.

Severe Backlash You deal @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[untyped]]{1d6 damage per level} to all creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:30] with a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell|basic] save. You automatically take full damage without attempting a save.

Effect: Energize Wings.name: Effect: Energize Wings
Effect: Energize Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cmhfYMEM4uzrNIiV]{Energize Wings}

You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Effect: Energy Ablation.name: Effect: Energy Ablation
Effect: Energy Ablation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iS4Vc2zv7vgL5mnX]{Energy Ablation}

You gain resistance to an energy damage type of your choice equal to the spell's rank.

Effect: Energy Shot.name: Effect: Energy Shot
Effect: Energy Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TSDbyYRQwhIyY2Oq]{Energy Shot}

On your first three Strikes of this encounter with a firearm or crossbow, you deal an additional 1 acid, cold, fire or electricity damage. You choose which damage type to deal as part of making each Strike.

Effect: Energy Ward.name: Effect: Energy Ward
Effect: Energy Ward.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lG4dYrnkE42IgnGG]{Energy Ward}

You gain resistance to one type of energy (acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality, or void) equal to 4 + the rank of the spell.

Effect: Enforce Oath.name: Effect: Enforce Oath
Effect: Enforce Oath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.g0C3tqGjgShoDyif]{Enforce Oath}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against attacks and effects by the chosen creature. You also gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against the chosen creature.

You also take a –1 status penalty to AC, attack rolls, and saves against all other creatures until you stop Enforcing your Oath.

Effect: Engine of Destruction.name: Effect: Engine of Destruction
Effect: Engine of Destruction.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GLHh9MWlcINLC6Q0]{Engine of Destruction}

Your construct innovation gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack rolls.

Effect: Enjoy the Show.name: Effect: Enjoy the Show
Effect: Enjoy the Show.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Igt8Ml5YIdxueMlF]{Enjoy the Show}

You take a circumstance penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you, or a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls targeting you.

Effect: Enlightened Presence.name: Effect: Enlightened Presence
Effect: Enlightened Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ROnjdPMvH0vkkWjQ]{Enlightened Presence}.

You and allies within 15 feet of you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws against mental effects.

Effect: Enter Spirit Trance.name: Effect: Enter Spirit Trance
Effect: Enter Spirit Trance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.djULKW76BbSoN3zb]{Enter Spirit Trance}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier, a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saving throws, and your melee Strikes deal 1 additional spirit damage.

Effect: Entity's Resurgence.name: Effect: Entity's Resurgence
Effect: Entity's Resurgence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5bCZGpp9yFHXDz1j]{Entity's Resurgence}

You remain at 1 Hit Point and gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level + your key ability modifier. However, the entity is in control. While the entity is in control, you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

Effect: Envenom Fangs.name: Effect: Envenom Fangs
Effect: Envenom Fangs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IY86Kvopp4ACuQsw]{Envenom Fangs}

The next fangs Strike deals an additional 1d6 persistent poison damage.

Effect: Eternal Torch.name: Effect: Eternal Torch
Effect: Eternal Torch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MRT8BGiIiVYfVcXh]{Eternal Torch}

You create a torch-like flame. If you create a flame on a weapon, you still need to use it as an improvised weapon to attack with the flame, just as with a torch.

Effect: Exalted Reaction (Desecrator).name: Effect: Exalted Reaction (Desecrator)
Effect: Exalted Reaction (Desecrator).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.8YIA0jh64Ecz0TG6]{Desecration}

Each enemy in your champion's aura takes a –1 status penalty to attack rolls against you.

Effect: Exalted Reaction (Redemption).name: Effect: Exalted Reaction (Redemption)
Effect: Exalted Reaction (Redemption).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.uptzvOLrZ3fctrl2]{Exalted Reaction}

You grant the resistance to yourself and all allies in your champion's aura, including the triggering ally. If you do, the resistance is reduced by 2 for all.

Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Rascal).name: Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Rascal)
Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Rascal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.KxpaxUSuBC7hr4F7]{Exemplary Finisher}

The foe takes a -10 circumstance penalty to its speed until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Wit).name: Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Wit)
Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Wit).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.KxpaxUSuBC7hr4F7]{Exemplary Finisher}

The foe takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Failure or Crit.name: Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Failure or Critical Failure)
Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Failure or Crit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IV8sgoLO6ShD3DCJ]{Expel Maelstrom}

The creature takes a -2 status penalty to all saving throws and skill checks for 10 minutes.

Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Misfortune).name: Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Misfortune)
Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Misfortune).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IV8sgoLO6ShD3DCJ]{Expel Maelstrom}
